jobs.title: Senior Python Developer - Remote
jobs.description: Join our fast-growing startup! Fully remote Python position with equity and unlimited PTO. Work with modern Python stack including FastAPI and Kubernetes.

facets.remote_flexibility: Fully remote position with flexible hours and timezone accommodation. Work from anywhere in the world.
facets.compensation: Competitive salary with equity options and performance bonuses. Early employee benefits.
facets.learning_growth: Rapid career progression with direct impact on product direction. Conference budget and learning stipend.
facets.company_culture: Startup culture with flat hierarchy and autonomous teams. Weekly demos and monthly hackathons.
facets.work_life_balance: Excellent work-life balance with flexible scheduling and unlimited PTO. No crunch time.
facets.tech_stack: Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform. Modern cloud-native stack.
facets.visa_sponsorship: Visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for exceptional candidates.

jobs.title: Mid-Level Java Developer
jobs.description: Join our established enterprise team! Work on Java backend systems in our Tokyo office. Standard benefits package.

facets.remote_flexibility: On-site position with limited remote flexibility. Occasional work from home allowed for special circumstances.
facets.compensation: Standard market salary with comprehensive benefits including health insurance and pension.
facets.learning_growth: Structured career ladder with annual reviews and training opportunities. Mentorship program available.
facets.company_culture: Professional corporate culture with clear hierarchies and established processes. Team-building events.
facets.work_life_balance: Standard working hours with occasional overtime during release cycles. 20 days PTO annually.
facets.tech_stack: Java, Spring Boot, Oracle, Maven, Jenkins, WebLogic. Enterprise-grade stable technologies.
facets.visa_sponsorship: No visa sponsorship available. Must have valid work authorization for Japan.

jobs.title: Full Stack Python Engineer - Hybrid
jobs.description: Hybrid position mixing remote and office work. Growing company looking for Python full-stack developers. Good balance of stability and growth.

facets.remote_flexibility: Hybrid position with 3 days remote, 2 days in office. Flexible core hours between 10am-4pm.
facets.compensation: Above-market salary with annual bonus and stock options. Regular salary reviews.
facets.learning_growth: Good growth opportunities as company scales. Internal mobility encouraged. Training budget available.
facets.company_culture: Growing company culture balancing startup agility with established practices. Collaborative teams.
facets.work_life_balance: Good work-life balance with predictable schedules. Minimal overtime expected. 25 days PTO.
facets.tech_stack: Python, Django, React, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker. Modern stack with room for experimentation.
facets.visa_sponsorship: Case-by-case visa sponsorship considered for exceptional senior candidates.

basic: I want fully remote work with flexible hours
Good work-life balance is very important to me
tech_focus: I want to work with Python and modern cloud technologies
